first-project.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
first-project.body:
A Hangman Game that runs in the browser, and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS using vanilla JavaScript.

Using key events to listen for the letters that a player will type, the theme is Breakfast at Tiffany's.
JavaScript, Bootstrap, HTML

https://github.com/lydiarachel/Hangman-Game

second-project.title: GifTastic
second-project.body:
This application utilizes the Giphy API to make a dynamic web page that populates with gifs that make your heart happy.

This application makes a call to the GIPHY API, and uses JavaScript and JQuery to change the HTML of the site.

https://github.com/lydiarachel/GifTastic

third-project.title: Crystal Game
third-project.body:
This web application allows a player to guess the answer, just like in Word Guess. This time, though, the player will guess with numbers instead of letters.
JQuery, HTML, CSS

https://github.com/lydiarachel/unit-4-game

fourth-project.title: Trivia Game
fourth-project.body:
A ThunderCats Trivia Game form with multiple choice options.

JavaScript, HTML, CSS

https://github.com/lydiarachel/TriviaGame

fifth-project.title: OmiFood Project
fifth-project.body:
A personal project through Udemy course. A mock online food order program. Upscale and beautiful design.

JavaScript, HTML, CSS

https://github.com/lydiarachel/omnifoodProject

sixth-project.title: Friend Finder
sixth-project.body:
A compatibility-based 'FriendFinder' application -- basically a dating app. This full-stack site will take in results from the users' surveys, then compare their answers with those from other users. The app will then display the name and picture of the user with the best overall match.

JavaScript, Node and Express Servers

https://github.com/lydiarachel/FriendFinder

seventh-project.title: Bamazon
seventh-project.body:
An Amazon-like storefront using MySQL. The app takes in orders from customers and depletes stock from the store's inventory.

Node.JS and MySQL

https://github.com/lydiarachel/Bamazon

eighth-project.title: Burger App
eighth-project.body:
A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!). MVC design pattern.

https://github.com/lydiarachel/burger
